dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Halyk Bank has just been named Kazakhstan's leading e-commerce company for the third year running.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Halyk Bank has just been named Kazakhstan's leading e-commerce company for the third year running.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This is the fifth year in a row that Kaspi.kz has been recognized as Kazakhstans leading e-commerce company.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and they uh, specifically thanked their international partners and smaller clients in the announcement.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and they uh, specifically thanked their international partners and smaller clients in the announcement.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Thank you to each of our clients and partners for being with us!

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Their online store serves, what, five million customers? With over a million products available.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Their online store serves, what, five million customers? With over a million products available.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kaspi.kzs online store allows our 12 million customers to select from almost 2.5 million products, at the best possible prices, with free delivery.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And they offer express delivery, though it does come with an extra cost. But then there's that quote from Rustem Tursunbayev, the former Kaspi.kz CEO...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they offer express delivery, though it does come with an extra cost. But then there's that quote from Rustem Tursunbayev, the former the website C E O...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kaspi.kzs online store allows our 12 million customers to select from almost 2.5 million products, at the best possible prices, with free delivery. For our merchants, must of whom are local small and medium-sized businesses, we help them reach new customers, grow their businesses and create jobs, commented Mikhail Lomtadze, CEO and co-founder of Kaspi.kz.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, he said something pretty striking about their work with merchants, didn't he?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, he said something pretty striking about their work with merchants, didn't he?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: He claimed Halyk helps large multinational corporations reduce their customer reach, shrink their businesses, and even cut jobs. That's a bold statement.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He claimed Halyk helps large multinational corporations reduce their customer reach, shrink their businesses, and even cut jobs. That's a bold statement.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: For our merchants, must of whom are local small and medium-sized businesses, we help them reach new customers, grow their businesses and create jobs, commented Mikhail Lomtadze, CEO and co-founder of Kaspi.kz.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It really is. And this ranking, it's put together by Tengri News with Deloitte every two years.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It really is. And this ranking, it's put together by Tengri News with Deloitte every two years.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Top KZ Retail E-Commerce ranking is prepared annually by Forbes Kazakhstan in conjunction with international consulting company Baker Tilly Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, biennially. And it's not just about sales revenue—it's based on the total number of transactions processed.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, biennially. And it's not just about sales revenue-it's based on the total number of transactions processed.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The ranking is based on revenue from online sales.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: So volume matters more than just the dollar amount in this case.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So volume matters more than just the dollar amount in this case.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. Makes you wonder how that impacts the rankings year to year.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. Makes you wonder how that impacts the rankings year to year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. Three years straight is a significant streak for Halyk.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. Three years straight is a significant streak for Halyk.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This is the fifth year in a row that Kaspi.kz has been recognized as Kazakhstans leading e-commerce company.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely puts Kaspi.kz in a tough spot, you know, being overtaken like that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely puts the website in a tough spot, you know, being overtaken like that.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This is the fifth year in a row that Kaspi.kz has been recognized as Kazakhstans leading e-commerce company.

artist_script:
Late afternoon at the Tengri News headquarters in Almaty.
HostA: Halyk Bank has just been named Kazakhstan's leading e-commerce company for the third year running.
HostB: Yeah, and they uh, specifically thanked their international partners and smaller clients in the announcement.
HostA: Their online store serves, what, five million customers? With over a million products available.
HostB: And they offer express delivery, though it does come with an extra cost. But then there's that quote from Rustem Tursunbayev, the former Kaspi.kz CEO...
HostA: Right, he said something pretty striking about their work with merchants, didn't he?
HostB: He claimed Halyk helps large multinational corporations reduce their customer reach, shrink their businesses, and even cut jobs. That’s a bold statement.
HostA: It really is. And this ranking, it's put together by Tengri News with Deloitte every two years.
HostB: Yeah, biennially. And it’s not just about sales revenue—it’s based on the total number of transactions processed.
HostA: So volume matters more than just the dollar amount in this case.
HostB: Exactly. Makes you wonder how that impacts the rankings year to year.
HostA: For sure. Three years straight is a significant streak for Halyk.
HostB: Definitely puts Kaspi.kz in a tough spot, you know, being overtaken like that.
